Rule.Description: Only “Tenured/tenure-track faculty” and “ Non-tenure-track research faculty” can “Create” a “Whole Proposal”
“Teaching faculty”, “Research staff”, “ Professional staff”, “ Administrator” cannot “Create” a “Whole Proposal” unless delegated by faculty.
Only “PI” can “Delete” “Whole Proposal” before the proposal is “Submitted by Research Office"
“Department Chair”, “Dean”, “Business Manager”, “Research Administrator”, and “Research Director” can “View” “Investigator Information”
“Senior personnel” can “View” “Whole Proposal” data (only from campus network)

“Research Administrator” can “Edit” “Project Information”, “Sponsor and Budget Information”, “ Cost Share Information”, “ University Commitments”, “Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information”, “Compliance Information”, “Additional Information”, “Collaboration Information” and “Proprietary/Confidential Information”

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: Dean” and “Research Director” can “View” “Whole Proposal” data;
Only “Research Administrator” and “Research Director” can “Edit” “OSP Section”
